title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.7 - Evaluation process
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.7 - Evaluation process

State Regulations
(a) Review of
applications. The division shall review applications in accordance with the
evaluation criteria specified in section
343.8
of this Part. (b) Approval. Approval of an application may
be conditioned upon the applicant's compliance with specified requirements
within a particular time period as communicated in a notification letter from
the director. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
343.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
